title: Hinako's My Wife
alternative_title: Hinako-san wa Boku no Yome!?, ヒナコさんは僕の嫁！
status: Hinako-san wa Boku no Yome!?, ヒナコさんは僕の嫁！
description:
Description :
        Tsukiwaka might be a fan of cute and girly things, but actually he can’t handle women well. One day, a strange, beautiful woman named Hinako showed up on his campus. She handed a hand-made lunch box to Tsukiwaka while smiling, “I am your wife.”
Since he is bad with women, Tsukiwaka thought he could resist such an unexpected self-declaration, but why does Hinako make his heart race? Should Tsukiwaka go along with her play?
